Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by laf8884 Hi, I've been having problems with my left nipple for about 8 months. First it was extremely unbearably itchy, so much that I scratched it til it became raw. This cleared up but ever since the nipple has been giving me problems. It seems to be erect all the time...not totally constant but certainly noticeable. I talked to my obgyn about this in August and she said it was probably nothing, possible irritation from a sports bra (I left the office feeling unsatisfied). Since then it's been on and off again erect, sometimes a bit scaly or rough feeling and lately I've been having pain on and off in the nipple. I have an appointment again tomorrow because I am so concerned, mainly after reading a post on another web board where a woman had a similar problem and was diagnosed with cancer, only after her doctor blew off her symptoms for a year..so, I'm really concerned now. I'm 31 with no family history (not that this really matters). Has anyone ever heard of anything like this or experienced it themselves? I'd appreciate any response. Thanks, L I've never heard of anything like that but I would strongly suggest you go see your doctor about it.
Posts.Title: NIPPLE QUESTION, very worried....
